item.title: Low ENG OIL PRESS Indication System

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided associated OIL PRESS, TEMP and QTY indications are operative.

note.para: Verify that the associated OIL PRESS, TEMP and QTY indications operate normally.

placard.para: Placard ENG OIL PRESS light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
